sentence.Network_en: Sam's mother said her son had a good upbringing and schooling.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨姆的母亲说她儿子家教好，受过良好教育。

sentence.Network_en: My mother, who had a sheltered upbringing, has fantastic memories of childhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 我妈妈在呵护下长大，对童年有着非常美好的回忆。

sentence.Network_en: I thought that my upbringing was "normal", whatever that is.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为我的成长过程甭管怎么说还算“正常”。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 星火英语四级词汇表·巧记·速记·精练 - 豆丁网 ... bring vt. 带来 upbringing n. 养育 broad a. 宽阔的;广泛的.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... untold 数不清的，无数的 upbringing 抚育，抚养；教养 update 使现代化；使靠最近.
考研英语作文主题词中心词精华总结 - 豆丁网 ... 把虚幻当现实 take fantasy for reality 抚养 upbringing 受害者 victim n.
复合名词_百度百科 ... outpouring 倾泻 upbringing 抚育，养育 on-goings （复）（常指古怪的）事件，行为.

list.abs: People who use foul language show their poor upbringing ., 口出秽言的人表示他缺乏教养.
每日雅思词汇：婚姻战争_新东方网 ... 财产分割: division of property 抚养费: upbringing payment 赡养费: alimony.
delicate porcelain 细润的瓷器delicate upbringing 娇生惯养delicate living 奢侈的生活
political upbringing政治教育religious upbringing宗教教育upbringing of successors to the cause培养事业接班人

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from obsolete upbring 'to rear' (see up-, bring)

entry.def: Your upbringing is the way that your parents treat you and the things that they teach you when you are growing up.

example.ex: Martin's upbringing shaped his whole life...
example.tran: 马丁的家庭教养影响了他的一生。

example.ex: Sam's mother said her son had a good upbringing and schooling.
example.tran: 萨姆的母亲说她儿子家教好，受过良好教育。

means.word_mean: 1. properties acquired during a person's formative years
2. raising someone to be an accepted member of the community;

sentences.sentence: "they debated whether nature or nurture was more important"

auth_sentence.content: It was a rebellion against my cosseted middle-class upbringing.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a rebellion against my cosseted middle-class upbringing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a rebellion against my cosseted middle-class upbringing.

auth_sentence.content: My aunts and uncle had...no theories about child upbringing.
auth_sentence.res_content: My aunts and uncle had...no theories about child upbringing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My aunts and uncle had...no theories about child upbringing.

auth_sentence.content: The record of Mohammed's upbringing was effectively deleted.
auth_sentence.res_content: The record of Mohammed's upbringing was effectively deleted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The record of Mohammed's upbringing was effectively deleted.

sentences.en: He had a normal middle-class upbringing.
sentences.cn: 他接受的是正规的中产阶级教育。

sentences.en: A knowledge of her upbringing is basic to an understanding of her books.
sentences.cn: 要读懂她的书就要首先了解她的成长经历。

sentences.en: After a very proper upbringing he chose to lead the Bohemian life of an artist.
sentences.cn: 他受过正统的教育,却立意过着艺术家我行我素的生活。
